jd: From: sana, Vrddhi Solutions, LLC sana@vrddhisolutions.com Reply to: sana@vrddhisolutions.com Position: ETL Business Analyst Location: Charlotte NC(Onsite)Visa- any visaDuration: 12 monthsCandidate must show the DL copy on video at the time of submissionNeed Telecom Experience.
